properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vijayulam ghana vijayulam 2, Kristesu prabhuvulo atyadhika vijayulam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paramunu vidi dharaketen̄ci maranin̄citivi kaluvari siluvalo 2, Niti mantuluga mamu tircitivi 2 nutana jivamu makiccinanduna{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Marana balamu nundi vidipin̄citivi marana bhayamulanu tolagin̄citivi, Maranamu gelci tirigi lecitivi samadhi ninnu geluvakapoyenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satru saitanunu odin̄ci ni sanghamunu nirmin̄citini, Patala dvaramul niluvakunda ni sanghamunu kapaducuntivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Golyatu lendaro helana cesiri babulonu rajulu paipaiki leciri, Kananiyulu kattulu dusina yerusalemunu kayucunna deva{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sramayu badha hinsa yainanu karuvu vastra hinata yainanu, Upadravamainanu khadgamainanu yeda bavuna mammu yesu prema nundi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokamu sariramu dadi ceyucundaga lokamun jayin̄cina vijayasalivi, Lokasthulapai vijayamu nicci vijaya visvasuluga cesina deva{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maha goppa mahimato marala vaccedavu satruvu senalu kalavarapadaga, Ni rajyamunu bhuvipai nilipi mammelu deva yuga yugamulu{/lang-eng}
